A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The movie had not substance\, most of the movie was unneeded and did nothing for the story. Not that there was much of a story. The amount of wasted potential is horrifying and the fact that people enjoyed it is sad. From a movie point of view\, the characters were 1D the story was a stretch at best and as a whole forgettable.\nRayn Johnson was acting like a middle school girl along with everyone at Disney and Lucas studios\, only middle schoolers are petty enough to spit in the face of their supports and expect not backlash.
